tool.name: Annotate Lped with CentiMorgans from HapMap
tool.description: The tool annotates your ped file with centimorgan values from the hapmap recombination maps

param.name: missing_value
param.label: missing centimorgan value in the map file e.g -9

tool.help:
A '-9' in the output map file indicates a missing value in the impute2 centimorgan files. So no centimorgan annotation was possible at this marker.
The tool uses a script written by Edward Hills and James Boocock to annotate the files with cM data from 1000 genomes.
